name: 莊澤光
objective: This course introduces design drawing as a visual language. Through the developments of freehand techniques and the practice of analytical drawing process, students will develop the abilities to describe both conceptual and perceptual aspects of a subject’s three-dimensional nature on two-dimensional media, and be able to use this visual language to explore, develop, and convey design ideas.
